info.title: cloud.dalane.api.projects
info.description: An API for Dalane Cloud Project Management Platform.

size.description: Specify the number of records to return in a page. The default is 100. 0 returns all records.

created_at.description: UNIX timestamp of when the entity was created

updated_at.description: UNIX timestamp of when the entity was updated

CreateBreakdownStructureElementData.description: A nested array of breakdown structure elements used when creating a breakdown structure using uploaded data.

method.description: Sets how the overall risk score will be calculated from the combined impact scores.

workpackage_id.description: The ID of the WBS deliverable

obs_element_id.description: The ID of the OBS role

/organisations/{organisation_id}/project.description: Create an OBS using a template or an uploaded file.
Displays details of the project obs role
Moves the role in the OBS to another position. E.g. change of manager or order of the roles.
Updates the project role
Deletes the project role from the OBS

200.description: Returns an array containing organisations that the user is a member of.

/organisations/{organisation_id}/project.description: Returns all role assignments in the Responsibility Assignment Matrix
Create a Project Responsibility Assignment Matrix by manually assigning responsibilities or uploading a file.
Updates the role assignment in the Responsibility Assignment Matrix.
Deletes a role assignment from the Responsibility Assignment Matrix
Create a Project RBS by adding elements, using another project, a template or an uploaded file.
Displays details of the project deliverable
Moves the element in the RBS to another position.
Updates the project RBS element
Deletes the project deliverable from the RBS
Create a Project WBS by adding elements, using another project, a template or an uploaded file.
Displays details of the project deliverable
Moves the element in the WBS to another position.
Updates the project WBS element
Deletes the project deliverable from the WBS
List work packages
Update work package properties
Get work package
Update work package
Changes the status of a work package to deleted

201.description: Invite somebody to join the organisation

200.description: Accept an invitation to join an organisation
Reject an invitation to join an organisation
